Tipene Funerals scandal: Fiona Bakulich investigation includes 10 bodies disinterred from Waikumete Cemetery https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tipene-funerals-scandal-fiona-bakulich-investigation-includes-10-bodies-disinterred-from-waikumete-cemetery/W5D5GQBHVJD5TH7EP42JKRI26I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tipene-funerals-scandal-fiona-bakulich-investigation-includes-10-bodies-disinterred-from-waikumete-cemetery/W5D5GQBHVJD5TH7EP42JKRI26I/ Raphael FranksBakulich, featured on reality TV show The Casketeers, to appear in court again on Friday. Sat, 09 Nov 2024 19:32:34 +0000 Fiona Bakulich (inset, top) was employed by Francis Tipene (inset, bottom) at Tipene Funerals, but it has been revealed Bakulich allegedly swindled her clients by improperly interring their dead relatives in the public mausoleum at Waikumete Cemetery. Photos / Michael Craig, Dean Purcell
